meanings.definition: Resembling a peg in shape or function.
meanings.sent1: The small, peglike mushrooms dotted the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: The peglike handle made it easy to carry the heavy bucket.
meanings.sent3: The peglike design of the chair legs gave the room a quirky touch.
meanings.sent4: Her peglike fingers swiftly assembled the puzzle pieces.
meanings.sent5: The peglike pattern of the fence posts created a neat and orderly appearance.
